## Search by LAU (municipality)


```{r nuts, echo=FALSE}

library(giscoR)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(reactable)


lau_codes <- gisco_get_lau(
  year = 2019,
  epsg = 4326,
  cache_dir = "../assets/data/geojson"
) %>% st_drop_geometry()

df <- lau_codes %>% select(CNTR_CODE,LAU_NAME, GISCO_ID) %>% arrange(GISCO_ID)

reactable(df,
          filterable = TRUE,
          searchable = TRUE,
          showPageSizeOptions = TRUE,
          striped = TRUE,
          paginationType = "jump"
          )

```
